roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

title: The Skeltons at Home
description: In this Christmas episode, Mr. and Mrs. Red Skelton and their real-life children, Richard and Valentina are visited by friends Bo Roos and Gene Fowler. Red's TV characters, including Clem Kadiddlehopper, also drop by to wish Red's family a Merry Christmas.

title: Learn to Dance in Ten Easy Lessons or One Hard One
Fancy Footwork
description: Red tries to sell robots for as Richman Pete; as Cauliflower McPugg, he displays a bit of fancy footwork while attempting to out-duel Charles Bronson, who appears in one of his earliest TV performances; musical guests are The Sportsmen.

roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

title: Father's Day Show
description: Red narrates a touching series of vignettes about how unappreciated fathers are in modern society.

title: He Made Good in the City
The Cop and the Anthem
description: It's Christmas Eve and the snow is falling thick and fast. Muggsy tries to convince Freddie the Freeloader to hop a freight train bound for Florida with him, but Freddie has other ideas. He plans to commit a minor crime and get himself sentenced to the county jail. With any luck, he'll be incarcerated in time to hang his Christmas stocking next to the other inmates'. Time after time, Freddie's plans are thwarted. The Maitre D at a fancy restaurant is convinced Freddie's a famous millionaire in disguise and won't charge him for his meal. Freddie tries to steal a bracelet from a jewelry store, but it falls through his pocket onto the floor. His attempt to assault a police officer fails when he slips on the proverbial banana peel. Frustrated and freezing Freddie walks in front of a church holding a Christmas Eve service and, listening to the uplifting music, decides that he's not too old to start life anew. In fact, a young choir boy promises him a job in his father's factory. Happy with his decision, Freddie strides away from the church door - straight into the arms of a policeman who arrests him for vagrancy.

roles.char: Accepted Award for Eva Marie Saint
Recipient Best Motion Picture Executive Award

title: Tippy Toe Dancing School for Teenagers
Desert Island
description: Red Skelton and Jamie Farr appear as navy men under the watchful eye of Buster Crabbe. Skelton and Farr accidentally go overboard in a life boat, and end up marooned on a desert island...or so they think.

title: County Fair or Minister of Agriculture
The First Thanksgiving or Thanksgiving with the Pilgrims
description: In this spoof of the Miles Standish-John Alden-Priscilla Mullins legend, Red plays John in a broad, farcical manner, given to slapstick clumsiness and cigar chomping anachronisms. The filmed quality of the show cuts out most of the spontaneous gags and asides expected of Red.

title: Clem Strikes Oil
description: The Kadiddlehopper's at first dismayed at the black gooey stuff on their land learn that it is worth a fortune with which Clem uses to create a financial empire that employs to make Daisy June a star so she will marry him.

title: Cesar Romero Hires Deadeye for TV Series
Episode #7.27
description: Three U.S. Navy men have been marooned on a small South Pacific island since World War II and don't know whether or not the war is over. On the other side of the island is a group of Japanese soldiers that is in the same predicament. Eventually, the two confused groups meet.

title: The Kadiddlehopper Mural or Clem the Artist
description: Clem Kadiddlehopper paints what he considers a masterpiece, and wants to exhibit it in New York.

title: Friends of Red Skelton Variety Show
Freddie and the World Series Ticket
San Fernando in Alaska
description: Crooked Mayor San Fernando runs off with his accomplice Ruby (Adams)to Alaska, the one state they haven't hidden in yet, where they set up business again with their usual graft, corruption, and hilarity.

title: Munson's Red Herring or Freddie and the Spies
San Fernando Loses the Dixie Queen
Appleby's Formula
description: George is an amateur inventor working out of his garage. He invents a gas additive that will eliminate smog, but his shrewish wife destroyed his lab in a fit of rage. While trying to remember the exact mixture, Mrs. Appleby accidentally drinks one of his experiments and becomes invisible.

title: Cauliflower Goes to Hollywood or Vinnie the P
Freddie's Beat Shack
description: Freddie's shack becomes a gathering place for beat-nicks.

title: Appleby's Bird Woman
description: After embarrassing her at the movies during a showing of "The Blob", Mrs. Appleby decides to teach George a lesson by tricking him into believing she's turned into a bird with the help of a borrowed parrot. He takes her (the bird) to a psychiatrist for help.

title: Son of Paleface Spoof
description: Jane Russell stars as Lillian Martin, a saloon girl who lives a double life as an outlaw.

title: San Fernando's Treasure Hunt
description: San Fernando Red and his beautiful but crooked companion are living in a shack at the docks when the come up with a phony pirate map and try to get suckers to invest in an undersea treasure hunt. They don't bargain on his backer being a tough, threatening gangster who insists on results.

title: Goodness Had Nothing to Do with It
description: In a parody of

title: Clem the Private Eye or 77 Moonset Strip
San Fernando for Governor
description: The mayor gets blackmailed with San Fernando's badger game photo, and must let him run a bookie room in city hall. When he pulls the same trick on the governor, they're forced to nominate him at the big convention, but the two politicos get their revenge by showing an unexpected movie.

title: Appleby's Predictions
description: Appleby predicts the World Series. His wife wants him to predict the presidential election.

title: Clem the Candidate
description: Two political party bosses try to come up with a perfect presidential candidate by using a massive "electronic brain".(A Univac) It decides that man would be Clem Kadiddlehopper. The public adores him and he's well on his way toward victory, despite that the brain was shown to be defective. One of the bosses has a dream of what a goof Clem would be in the white house.

title: San Fernando Investigates the Investigating Committees
Episode #10.10
description: Clem visits the Johnson's Wax factory and raises the ire of an executive (Played by Cedric Hardwicke) by his bungling.

title: Deadeye and the Alamo
description: Red Skelton and Cesar Romero star in this episode about what "really" happened at the Alamo.

title: Freddie Gets Sick
description: A doctor wants to condemn the city dump.

title: Jay North Adopts Freddie the Freeloader or Freddie's Benefactor
Deadeye and the Gunslinger
description: A hired gun is needed to stop holdups in a saloon.

title: McPugg's Investor
description: Rydell invests in boxer McPugg.

title: Freddie's Romance
description: Rhonda Fleming stars as a rich girl whose mother mistakes Freddie the Freeloader (Red Skelton) as a millionaire at a masquerade ball. Hijinks ensue when she comes to Freddie's house for lunch the next day.

title: San Fernando and the Kaaka Maami Island
Freddie and the Yuletide Doll
description: Freddy the Freeloader is all alone on Christmas. He finds a Raggedy Ann doll. The doll comes to life, and Freddie enjoys a romantic time with her.

title: The Many Skeltons in Las Vegas
The Iceman Goeth
description: Vivian Vance stars as Clara Appleby. Her husband, George (Red Skelton), invents a cooling blanket, with hilarious results.

title: A Pantomimic Presentation of a Person's Problems in a Park
How to Fail in Business Without Really Trying or How to Use the Name of a Hit Broadway Musical Without Getting Sued

roles.char: P. Lawford - Director of Rocking Chair Maintenance

title: Somebody Up There Should Stay There
Ten Baby Fingers and 12 Baby Toes

roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

title: Who Put the Bobby Sox in Mr. Appleby's Chowder?
description: George Appleby's middle-aged wife (Audrey) has formed a fan club for an obnoxious rock n' roll idol(Rydell). When he stays for a visit, the house is besieged by teenage girls, and George is the one who makes sacrifices. In the Silent Spot, Red plays an aging film hero trying desperately to appear youthful.

title: Of Mouth and Men
description: Red and Martha Raye do a takeoff on the then-current Hollywood epic, Antony and Cleopatra".

title: Where There's a Will, There's a Wife
Children Should Be Seen But Not Had

roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

title: Witness for the Persecution or Half a Lawyer Is Better Than None
The Bel Air Haykickers AKA the Beverly Hills Haykickers
Come to Me, My Melon-Headed Baby

roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid
Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

title: Don't Sit Under the Tombstone with Anybody Else But Me
Do You Take This Woman for Your Awful Wedded Wife?
It's So Nice to Have a Louse Around the House

roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

title: The Mouth Shall Rise Again
description: Redeye sends back east for brides for the cowboys, but he gets stuck with Martha, who can't take no for an answer. In the Silent Spot, Milqutoast college student Red has bully Peter Lupus for a roommate.

title: Sing a Song of Sing Sing
Sit Down, You're Rocking the Boat
That's the Way the Fortune Cookie Crumbles
Cast Your Brat Upon the Water

roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

title: How Are Things in Glocca Moron?
One Man's Mate Is Another Man's Poison
I Was a S.A.P. for the F.B.I.
I Want to Go Where the Wild Goof Goes
Oliver Twist Parody or the Goon and Sixpence
I'm Heading for the Last Grownup

roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

title: Disorder in the Court or Crime Doesn't Pay Like It Used To
Be It Ever So Grumble, There's No Place Like Home
A Man's Dump Is His Castle
A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Harem
A Sap's Fable or The Great Brain Robbery
The Fastest Goon in the West
Love, Your Tragic Smell Is Everywhere or A Hat Full of Hate
When It's Teepee Time Down South
description: The world's richest Indian proves to be an easy mark for Fernando Red, who sells him worthless desert land for his mother's retirement home, but when he thinks it's an oil patch, he wants it back.

roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

cast.name: The Hillcrest Elementary School Choir of Los Angeles

title: A Man and His Money Are Soon Parted or A Fool and His Money Are Soon Married
A Bad Man Nowadays Is Hard to Find
The Seven Year Wretch
description: While waiting in line for his unemployment check,George Appleby (Red) meets Archie Moore,also out of work. A man sells him a trained Bear, which he puts in a take-on-all-comers boxing show in a carnival. Moore shows up to challenge the bear. Red's silent spot pantomime involves a Holmesian detective chasing a hooded bad guy around a spooky house-type set.

title: Yellow Belly in a Purple Sage
Freddie at the South Pole or Panhandle with Care
Appleby's Soul or Ah, Sweet Misery of Wife

roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

title: The Gall of the Golden West

cast.name: The Marine Pacific Drum and Bugle Corps

title: Whose Afraid of the Big, Bad Wife?

roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

cast.name: The Hillcrest Elementary School Choir of Los Angeles

title: Concert in Pantomime
description: All in mime. Short mime acts then a complete Silent Spot.

title: The Agony and the Nag-Ony
description: Red as George Appleby tries to drive his hated wife insane with the help of crooked "door-to-door Psychiatrist" Dr. Sigmund Fraud.(Vincent Price).In the monologue, Red enacts an encounter between a prospector and a rattlesnake, and in the silent spot, he's a musician searching for quiet inspiration in a tumbledown, desolate cabin, and finding anything but.

title: Down the Old Chisholm Trail with the Old Chiseler
Be It Ever So Homely, There's No Face Like Clem
Half a Loafer Is Better Than None
description: Red as Freddy is caught after breaking into a men's club for explorers, where he's recognized by his long-lost father, Junglerot Freeloader (Ed Wynn). They go on to Africa in search of a rarely seen gorilla. later, Ed and Red celebrate Wynn's upcoming birthday with a big prop cake, and in the silent spot Red plays rich playboy forced to work at a bakery.

title: A Thousand and One Arabian Nuts
The Bum Who Came in from the Cold

roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

title: A Beauty Can Skin You Deep
How to Succeed in Loafing Without Really Trying
Mother Knows Best AKA Mother Knows Pest

roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

title: The Land of Bilk and Money
What Did You Do in the Dump, Daddy?
The Best Sheriff Money Can Buy
description: Deadeye finds out about a golden statue to be dedicated in his honor by his grafting cronies, but plans to steal it instead.

title: Jerk Be Nimble
description: Clem bakes a cake for the county fair that's so light it floats, so agents from a poverty stricken Eastern European country bring him over to assist in their space program.In the Silent Spot, Red's a Drug Store burglar.

title: The Fastest Cuspidor in the West
The Taming of the Screw-Loose
description: Forsooth, a bumbling medieval servant, brings deadly bad luck to the father and son of a French aristocratic family. Randall sings "Winchester Cathedral", and in the silent Spot, Red tries to be first in line for Rose Bowl tickets.

title: In One Head and Out the Other
Absence Makes the Hate Grow Fonder
Sappiness Is Just a Thing Called Clem
Yo Ho Ho and a Bottle of Dumb
Not with My Dump You Don't
It's a Treat to Beat a Cheat on the Mississippi Mud
For Better or Worse Like George Appleby Got
Saddle Sores on the Old Corral
The Spy with the Leaky Mouth
Where There's Smoke, There's a Dragon
A Spy Is a Peeping Tom on Salary
A New York Stripper Is Not Always a Steak
The Bear Was a Barefaced Liar
Climb Upon My Knee, Dummy Boy
Little Old Rainmaker: Me
description: San Fernando Red finds a rich sucker in a wealthy Montana rancher played by Godfrey. His huge acreage is going bone dry for lack of rain, so Fernando first tries to sell him a rain-making contraption, then they both go up in a rickety airplane to seed the clouds. Red and Arthur do some blackouts, and in the Silent Spot, a medieval painter pleads with a short-tempered King for a commission at the royal gym.

title: He Who Steals My Dump Steals Trash
Marriage Is Made in Heaven and Las Vegas
description: George works for a romance magazine where the boss insists on seeing his married home life, but at the last minute his wife leaves him, and co-worker Berle must pretend he's her. The silent spot shows Red playing Santa on a snowy roof.

title: When East Meets West, You Need a New Compass
Love Is an Itch You Can't Scratch
Sheriffs Are Bought, Not Made
description: Deadeye is up against a tough old mine owner with an even tougher son, and a mine with it's own ghost. In the silent spot, Red's hired off the street to work in a candy shop, where he can't do anything but make a mess.

title: Cauliflower Ears That Bloom in the Spring, Tra-La
description: An English fight promoter gets Bolivar to take Cauliflower to London for a match with his equally punchy boxer.In the silent spot, Red burlesques George Washington, over anxious to chop down his father's cherry tree.

title: My Brother Wears My Mother's Army Shoes
Life, Liberty, and the Pursuit of George Appleby
San Fernando: Man with a Heart of Stolen Gold
The Love Bug'll Getcha If You Don't Use DDT
Rings on Her Fingers Also Go Through Your Nose
He Who Steals My Robot Steals Trash
Guess Whose Dinner Is Coming to Freddie?
The Revenge of Prudence Pennyfeather or Wide Saddles in the Old Corral
A Woman's a Rag, a Bone, and a Hank of Mouth
Love Is a Funny Thing
description: Red, and guest Jane Powell, each play five different characters in a special comedy and music edition of the program.

title: He Who Has a Heart of Gold Should See a Doctor
While Trying to Win the West, He Lost the East
The Best Thing to Get Out of Marriage Is to Get Out of Marriage
Don't Look a Wooden Gift Horse in the Mouth
Beauty Is Only Skin Deep, Unless You're a Banana
Why the Show Must Go On
Beneath His Ragged Shirt Lies Ragged Underwear
Bathtub Gin Never Leaves a Ring
Deadeye Goes to School or a Lemon for the Teacher
Give a Man Enough Rope and He'll Start a Rodeo
Vagrancy Is Just Loitering That Takes a Little Longer
Uneasy Lies the Neck that Wears the Noose
Button Up Your Overcoat: You Forgot Your Pants
Will the Real Robin Hood Please Fall Out of the Tree?
You Can Lead a Horse to Water, But He'll Go by Himself to Scotch
You Can't Cheat an Honest Man - But You Can Try

cast.name: Gary Puckett and The Union Gap

title: The Traveling Saleslady and the Farmer's Son
John Wayne's 40th Anniversary or Hominy and True Grits
description: Red starts off with a monologue about how sex has affected movies, and mimes a little boy at a monster film. Guest John Wayne does a skit about different sorts of autograph hunters and one where Deadeye faces Rooster Cogburn in a saloon duel. The silent spot, titled "The Happy Irish Pub", sees Red hired as a jig-dancing, furniture-smashing bouncer.

title: The Emergency Case or See Your Doctor Once a Year Even If It Kills You
Alaska or an Icicle Built for Two
There's One Thing Money Won't Buy and Someday We'll Find Out What It Is
It's Better to Have Loved and Lost - Much Better
He Wanted to Be a Square Shooter But He Found That his Barrel was Round
The Son of Oliver Twist or Junior Is Just a Little Dickens
Crime Doesn't Pay But It's Tax Free
You Can Take the Boy Out of the Country If You Promise Not to Bring Him Back
If Marriages Are Made in Heaven, Why Do They Call It Heaven?
There's No Business Like Show Business, But When There's No Business, Show Business Goes Out of Business Just Like Any Other Business
Charity Begins at Home, But Nowadays, Who Can Afford a Home?
Is This Anyway to Ruin an Airline?

cast.name: Danny Davis and the Nashville Brass

title: When East Meets West, You've Sure Got a Skinny Country
People Who Like People Are Cannibals
The Three Musketeers Ride Again, Those Ding-Dong Daddies from Dumas
Bill Bailey Must Have Been Married, That's Why He Never Came Home
Blood Is Thicker Than Water and Harder to Shave With
He Died with His Boots on Cause He Had Cold Feet to Start or He Died with His Boots Off, That's Why He Stubbed His Toe
San Fernando's Spy School or How to Make a Possible Mission Impossible
Be It Ever So Crumbled, There Is No Place Like Home
Stone Walls Do Not a Prison Make: So They Added Iron Bars
Freddie's Desperate Hour
description: Burr and Anderson hide out in Freddie's shack.

title: San Fernando Red and the Football Star

roles.char: Junior Cavendish - the Mean Widdle Kid

title: If at First You Don't Succeed, Forget It
